Instance.description:
Allow a test set to be referenced.
This is a full test set that is reference-able in OE, allowing a test set to be a single entry in a test set. Unlike the rest of the test variants, which are instantiated at time of use, this one is still a class at the time of use. This is why we're using __new__(). This allows us to call this like a function and still get the desired results.

TdescFragTag.name: test
TdescFragTag.description:
A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet.
ORs of ANDs
